trans-unit.source: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.

Use the SecurityTokenSerializer class to read and write <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> classes as XML.
The SecurityTokenSerializer class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them.

For security tokens, these methods are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> class.
Determines whether this serializer can read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
The CanReadKeyIdentifier method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> XML element can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
reader is .
Determines whether this serializer can read a clause in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
The CanReadKeyIdentifierClause method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%2A> method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier clause.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified key identifier clause can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
reader is .
Determines whether this serializer can read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore method.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier clause.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
reader is .
Determines whether this serializer can read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the CanReadKeyIdentifierCore method.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the CanReadKeyIdentifierCore method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified key identifier clause can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
reader is .
Determines whether this serializer can read the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
The CanReadToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadTokenCore%2A> method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the security token.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the security token can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
reader is .
Determines whether this serializer can read the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the CanReadTokenCore method.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the CanReadTokenCore method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the security token.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the security token can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
reader is .
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.
The CanWriteKeyIdentifier method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier to write.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this serializer can write the specified key identifier; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
keyIdentifier is .
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier clause.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method.

The CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method.

Called by the base class.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method calls the CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that represents the key identifier clause to write.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this serializer can write the specified key identifier clause; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
keyIdentifierClause is .
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier.
Called by the base class.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore method.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifier%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method calls the CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier to write.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this serializer can write the specified key identifier; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
keyIdentifier is .
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified security token to XML.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteTokenCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method.
The CanWriteToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteTokenCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to convert to XML.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the security token can be written; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
token is .
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified security token to XML.
Called by the base class.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the CanWriteTokenCore method.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method calls the CanWriteTokenCore method.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to convert to XML.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the security token can be written; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
token is .
Reads the key identifier using specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
The ReadKeyIdentifier method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier that is read.
reader is .
Reads the key identifier clause using specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

reader is .
Reads the key identifier clause using specified XML reader.

reader is .
Reads the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method.
The ReadToken method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the security token.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token type.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is read.
reader is .
-or- tokenResolver is .
Reads the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the ReadTokenCore method.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method calls the ReadTokenCore method.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the security token.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token type.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is read.
reader is .
-or- tokenResolver is .
Writes the specified key identifier using the specified XML writer.
